00226 #define __geoxml_foreach_xpath_result(element, xpath_result) \
00227         GdomeXPathResult * __xpath_result = xpath_result; \
00228         if (__xpath_result != NULL) \
00229                 for (element = (GdomeElement*)gdome_xpresult_singleNodeValue(__xpath_result, &exception); \
00230                 element != NULL || (gdome_xpresult_unref(__xpath_result, &exception), 0); \
00231                 element = (GdomeElement*)gdome_xpresult_iterateNext(__xpath_result, &exception))
00232 
00240 #define __geoxml_foreach_element(element, list) \
00241         libgebr_foreach_gslist(element, list)

00249 #define __geoxml_foreach_element_with_tagname_r(base, tagname, element, hygid) \
00250         GdomeNodeList *         __node_list##hygid; \
00251         GdomeDOMString *        __string##hygid; \
00252         int                     __i##hygid, __l##hygid; \
00253         __string##hygid = gdome_str_mkref(tagname); \
00254         __node_list##hygid = gdome_el_getElementsByTagName(base, __string##hygid, &exception); \
00255         gdome_str_unref(__string##hygid); \
00256         __l##hygid = gdome_nl_length(__node_list##hygid, &exception); \
00257         for (__i##hygid = 0, element = (GdomeElement*)gdome_nl_item(__node_list##hygid, 0, &exception); \
00258                 __i##hygid < __l##hygid || (gdome_nl_unref(__node_list##hygid, &exception), 0); \
00259                 element = (GdomeElement*)gdome_nl_item(__node_list##hygid, ++__i##hygid, &exception))
